definition: character scroll/scroll painting
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: He also collects rare ancient scrolls and sculptures.
sentences.chinese: 他的主要收藏包括罕見的古代畫軸和雕塑。

sentences.english: Debbie purchased several kakemono scrolls during her year as an exchange student in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 德比在日本做交換學生時買了幾卷畫軸。

sentences.english: I can draw now any xy axis where I please, anywhere in the plane of the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 可以在任意地方畫軸，不管是黑板面任意點。

item made from woven silk or rayon
letter/also written 書札|书札
Long Xing Quan - "Dragon Fist" - Martial Art
paper dolls for ritual use in the shape of people or animals
booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)

to spread/to hand down/to disseminate
